chargeHist.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal 4th+)

result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (5th) [Modifiers: Alcohol Fine Enhancer] and Operating w/ PAC (5th) [Modifiers: Alcohol Fine Enhancer]. The defendant was found guilty of both charges. Because Wisconsin law provides for only one penalty even if there is a conviction on both, no additional penalty has been imposed as a result of the second charge.

  • Sky C Sparks was found guilty of OWI (5th) [Modifiers: Alcohol Fine Enhancer], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).
  • Sky C Sparks was found guilty of Operating While Revoked (5th), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).
  • Sky C Sparks was found guilty of Operating w/ PAC (5th) [Modifiers: Alcohol Fine Enhancer], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant is eligible for Challenge Incarceration and Substance Abuse programs.
Consecutive to: With any sentence now serving

superMiscConds.notes:
Participates in and successfully completes any assessments, evaluations, and/or treatment programs as directed by agent. 
Pay court ordered financial obligations and supervision fees as directed by agent. 
Maintain absolute sobriety. 
May not enter any establishment where the primary purpose is the sale of alcohol.  This includes but is not limited to bars, taverns, or liquor stores. 
Maintain full time employment/school.
Submit DNA sample when defendant reports to jail.  
Comply with any conditions imposed by agent/Dept. of Corrrections.

supervisions.notes:
Good time/huber
Concurrent with Count 1 but consecutive with any sentence now serving.
